title: Privatization of Humanities Act
content: Privatization of Humanities Act - Amends the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 to abolish the National Endowment for the Humanities (NEH) and the National Council on the Humanities (NCH). Renames such Act the National Foundation on the Arts Act of 1965. Requires the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to provide for the termination of the affairs of the NEH and the NCH.
